scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && glib-compile-schemas data/ && GSETTINGS_SCHEMA_DIR=data ./builddir/main.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf builddir && rm -rf mesonbuilddir && rm -rf debian
scripts.meson-install: npm run build && npm run meson-setup && npm run meson-compile && cd mesonbuilddir && meson install
scripts.meson-uninstall: cd mesonbuilddir && ninja uninstall && cd .. && npm run meson-clean
scripts.install-data: sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/obision-app-optional-soft/data/icons && sudo cp data/applications.json /var/lib/obision-app-optional-soft/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/applications /var/lib/obision-app-optional-soft/data/icons/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/categories /var/lib/obision-app-optional-soft/data/icons/
scripts.deb-build: dpkg-buildpackage -us -uc -b && mkdir -p builddir && mv ../obision-app-optional-soft_*.deb builddir/obision-app-optional-soft.deb && mv ../obision-app-optional-soft_*.buildinfo builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true && mv ../obision-app-optional-soft_*.changes builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deb-install: sudo dpkg -i builddir/obision-app-optional-soft.deb && sudo apt-get install -f
